p: Since RRV has been a public health issue for some time now in Australia, vaccine research there has led to several candidates in preclinical studies [ 231, 232, 233, 234], and formalin-inactivated vaccines have successfully passed Phase I, II, and III clinical trials [ 235, 236]. However, this vaccine is not commercialized, and no RRV vaccine is currently available, highlighting the importance of public/private partnerships to invest in vaccine licensure [ 237].
